prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
1. Piano, Guitar, Synth Lead, and Bass are the instruments featured in this song, but Drums are absent.
